mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_project where status = 'Y'

select project_no , name owner , project_title , public_status , (select count(*) from tb_like l where l.member_no = 1 and project_no = p.project_no) "like" from tb_project p join tb_member m on (owner_no = member_no) where p.status = 'Y' order by p.project_no desc
